titleinfo.title: Indians for Indians Radio Show, August 13, 1947

mods.tableOfContents: Interviews with: Amos Toahty - Announcer; Jack Scott - President, Inter-Tribal Organization; Charles Grounds - Seminole Attorney; Bob Goombi - President, Exposition. Tribal Songs Contest: Cheyennes (Guy Heap of Birds; Charles Curtis & Wife): 3 Songs; Clan Songs; Return of Warriors (Victory); Clan War Song (Wolf). Poncas (Sylvester Warrior, Francis Eagle): 3 War Dance Songs). Caddos (Ralph Murrow, Houston Edmonds, Charles Smith): 3 Turkey Dance Songs.
mods.note: When citing recordings from this collection, please using the following: Indians for Indians Radio Show. Western History Collections, University of Oklahoma Libraries.
